Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and achieve substantial growth. Given its immense value to you, I propose a special introductory offer priced at $1200000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
